cause.description:
If you are a huge mets fan join my group die hard mets fan and im going to need all possible cooperation of eliminating all people that cause a threat to the mets lol jk But im not joking
1. The mets are the best team in the national league
2. Lefty pitching is a weakness we must destroy them
3. and i love Carlos beltran so worship him
cause.mission: To destroy every team besides the mets
cause.name: Mets win the World series
